frontmatter.title: Three years of fighting for freedom
frontmatter.description: Three years ago Aragon was born. When we started it, it was clear that this would be a decade-long effort. It is tough, but it is the change the world needs

frontmatter.title: Personal review of AGP proposals for the Jan 24th, 2019 vote
frontmatter.description: With the next AGP vote around the corner, I wrote an overview of the proposals that made it to the ballot
